about_the_game:
Summary

Puzzle Dazzle is a unique, addictive and breathtaking take on the classic block puzzle game formula. The synchronization of energizing music and gorgeous art creates a mesmerizing and intense overall experience. Enjoy the banging music, calming melodies, reactive backgrounds and spectacular special effects while strategically matching blocks and completing objectives.

🎮 Arcade Mode: Dive into a Visual Extravaganza!

We have curated 50 unique levels set in surreal landscapes. Each level is a visual feast with an extraordinary blend of graphics and gameplay, making Arcade Mode a true celebration of sensory delight!

🌐 Survival Mode: Rise to the Top of the Leaderboard!

Compete against the clock as you strive to surpass global competitors and secure your spot at the pinnacle of the leaderboard. Endurance meets strategy in this mode, providing an adrenaline-pumping experience that will keep you coming back for more.

🎭 Theatre Mode: Immerse Yourself in Visual Splendour!

Indulge in a unique experience of Theatre Mode, where Puzzle Dazzle transcends gaming into a visual spectacle. Enjoy the harmonious synchronization of music and graphics making theatre mode an immersive experience. Lose yourself in the visual symphony of Theater Mode.

The Game Features:

  • 50+ Handcrafted Levels
  • 3 Game Modes to Play
  • Full Controller Support
  • Steam Leaderboards and Achievements
  • Steam Cloud
